title: Facet Search Count not matching
description: In facet we have different brands like Nokia, Sony, Sony Ericssion, etc. When we click on Sony, it shows results of Sony and Sony Ericssion which is incorrect. Ideally it should show only Sony. Please let me know how to fix the issues.

comments.author: Erik Hatcher
comments.content: The issue tracker is not for user questions.   Please use solr-user list for continued discussion.  The issue is likely that you have indexed your field in a tokenized fashion, which is generally not what you want with faceting.
